articles.title: Freshworks CEO Girish Mathrubootham steps down, shares tumble more than 25% | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Dennis Woodside, who was president of India's largest listed SaaS company, has taken over as the chief executive officer
articles.content: BENGALURU : Girish Mathrubootham has stepped down from the role of chief executive officer of Nasdaq-listed software firm Freshworks, transitioning into the role of executive chairman. Dennis Woodsid… [+4213 chars]

articles.author: Jonel Aleccia, The Associated Press
articles.title: Bird flu in Texas has spread to some workers - Fortune
articles.description: Farmers have been hesitant to allow health officials onto their land because of the "stigma" of bird flu, another vet said.
articles.content: The first calls that Dr. Barb Petersen received in early March were from dairy owners worried about crows, pigeons and other birds dying on their Texas farms. Then came word that barn cats  half of t… [+5016 chars]
